title: Hi there!
text:
I am a Ph.D.Â candidate in Social Science (Economics) at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. I am on the 2024-2025 job market.
My research fields lie in Urban Economics, Entrepreneurship, and Political Economy. My current work focuses on the firm dynamics and the orgins of (in) formal entreprise.



Education

Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Hong Kong
